website_summaries.verdict: Fun 200-thread count all-cotton sheets provide a pop of color.
pros: Red poppy pattern with white background is cheerful and airy
Sheet set includes fitted and flat sheet plus pillowcase
Could be matched with black accents
cons: The sheets may feel more rough than other all-cotton sheets

customer_reviews.title: are these "irregular" sheets ??
customer_reviews.text: i love the pattern and color, BUT, the flat queen sheet seems to be irregular and not cut correctly, when folding the sheet, trying to match corners doesn't work because the sheet is short and narrow at one end disappointing seller should disclose that these are not 1st run
customer_reviews.author: Syda Awedisean

customer_reviews.title: BIG sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are great, cotton is nice and crisp. Even though they are a lower thread count, they are not scratchy. I’m deducting a star because the king set is HUGE. I actually thought I had ordered a california King by accident (I didn’t). So these would be great if you had a very deep comforter. But for my average mattress, the fitted sheet hangs off a couple of inches so not tight and snug. The top sheet so big that i have to tuck it way under the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: achoo

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sheets
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted these sheets since I saw them several years ago and finally decided to buy them. They are crisp and cool which is what I wanted and the flower print always makes me feel happy. The color has not faded after several washes.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: lovely, comfy sheets
customer_reviews.text: i love marimekko and these cotton sheets are lovely. They look great - just like the photo - and the cotton feels good. It's not a super high thread count, but the upside of that is that they are breathable. Items seems well made, but i haven't had it for more than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sam42

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Vey cute sheet set. The 200 thread count feels soft against skin yet is very durable. This famous Unikko print will surely brighten up the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Salted caramel

customer_reviews.title: Posey perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sheets! What else can I say? They are exactly as seen in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen O'Meara

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: I love my pillow cases! Adds a shot of color to the bed.
customer_reviews.author: DonForSan

customer_reviews.title: missing pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: Sheets were lovely but the pillowcases were missing so i had to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: These pillowcases are made of quality weight fabric, not thin and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Kris G Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: bright colors that hold
customer_reviews.text: i love marimekko unikko and bought these for my new bed. the colors really pop and they stay after washing (cold water, no dryer for me). they are 200 thread count, so a little course but the upside is that they are very breathable. they look super cute, and i bought a queen size too.
customer_reviews.author: Sam42

product_meta.title: Marimekko Mini Unikko Pillowcase Pair, King, Red
product_meta.description: Size:King PillowcaseInspired by the first floral collection designed by Marimekko, the Unikko Pillowcase Pair pays homage to this classic poppy red pattern that is sure to make a bold statement in any bedroom. King pillowcase dimensions: (20"x40").

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars41 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
